name: Gavin_Brown_Bonded_Leather_Dual_Reclining_Sofa
description: Dependable Comfort.Part of our motion line of furniture, the Gavin Reclining Sofa has a built-in solid metal reclining mechanism that at the pull of a handle furnish a restful spot to read or watch TV. Bonded leather and complementing stitching elegantly dress the sofa.
